title: Cryptogreatdane
author: Cryptogreatdane
content: Hi everyone,   I'm going to be doing a video specifically on the 2021 Lealana coins including the error coins. Now that they've most likely been delivered Id like to see if any more variations in errors have been found. I have already seen one in edition to the one 2stout posted. The way I see it is, there are 2 variations to the error coins. First, the true error coin of the spaced out L which is an actual hologram error. Second error is partial holograms that have been omitted. I think it will be important post your error with your coin# so there will be an early record of these errors that truly came from the Smoothie factory. The goal is to discourage people in the future from creating their own #2 error coin by removing a portion of the hologram. Especially if we see these selling at a premium in the future. If you do post your error coin and coin# Ill mention your coin specifically in my video with your permission.

comments.author: WhyFhy
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptogreatdane on October 06, 2022, 10:17:58 PMHi everyone,   I'm going to be doing a video specifically on the 2021 Lealana coins including the error coins. Now that they've most likely been delivered Id like to see if any more variations in errors have been found. I have already seen one in edition to the one 2stout posted. The way I see it is, there are 2 variations to the error coins. First, the true error coin of the spaced out L which is an actual hologram error. Second error is partial holograms that have been omitted. I think it will be important post your error with your coin# so there will be an early record of these errors that truly came from the Smoothie factory. The goal is to discourage people in the future from creating their own #2 error coin by removing a portion of the hologram. Especially if we see these selling at a premium in the future. If you do post your error coin and coin# Ill mention your coin specifically in my video with your permission. Here's the topic. Might make things a little easier for people to reference. Just got a Lealana 2021 Rainbow Brass Error Design D Rainbow Brass #47 back from MJ purchased from Saxoshi.Got a MS68, verified the load.https://www.blockchain.com/explorer/addresses/btc/1JLw8Jp7SKJ7Ps68MYJKM3uXGtwueWWPqi

comments.author: Cryptogreatdane
comments.body: Hi,  What is the error on this coin? It appears that rainbow holo on front is intact and it does not appear to have the L  EALANA error. We have collected about 10 errors so far from the 2021 coins. I will show and name them once the 2022s arrive and video complete.

comments.author: 2stout
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptogreatdane on February 14, 2023, 09:31:37 PMHi,  What is the error on this coin? It appears that rainbow holo on front is intact and it does not appear to have the L  EALANA error. We have collected about 10 errors so far from the 2021 coins. I will show and name them once the 2022s arrive and video complete.The L appears to be too far spaced out from the EALANA; looks like the L EALANA error to me.

It appears that rainbow holo on front is intact and it does not appear to have the L  EALANA error. We have collected about 10 errors so far from the 2021 coins. I will show and name them once the 2022s arrive and video complete.The L appears to be too far spaced out from the EALANA; looks like the L EALANA error to me. yeah your right. I see it now. Ill add it to the error list.

comments.author: Steeley
comments.body: Here's the thread where Smoothie acknowledges this errorhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5410318.msg60889873#msg60889873

comments.author: Cryptogreatdane
comments.body: On this thread im trying to gather the specific coins that have the errors. When I do my videos I can share those specific coin numbers so there will be a record of those coins as official errors. So far I have about 10 coins as official errors.

comments.author: 2stout
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptogreatdane on February 15, 2023, 12:56:32 AMOn this thread im trying to gather the specific coins that have the errors. When I do my videos I can share those specific coin numbers so there will be a record of those coins as official errors. So far I have about 10 coins as official errors.Not saying that there aren't more but your 10 coin error count= the total number accounted for thus far- (mine/unfinished, acknowledged by smoothie) + the other 9 listed by smoothie (3 for Nickel Rainbow Design D & 6 for Brass Rainbow Design D).
